page.title: 07STANDARD OF LIVING
page.content: About 90% of households have a car. Nearly 25% more have two or more.Many older houses have no garage and cars are parked on the road.Telephones and freezers are almost essential and few homes are without.Only two houses were recorded without T.V. and by far the majority have colour,with about 30% having more than one receiver.The same proportion have video recorders and computers.All recorded had some type of radio or music player.Nearly all had washing machines,usually automatic and some form of food mixer.All houses in the area have mains electricity and all but 8 have mains water.The rest draw water from wells or streams.Most houses in Nanstallon are connected to the main sewer,but the rest have septic tank drainage.
